0d","dweb:/ipfs/QmSyqjksXxmm2mCG6qRd1yuwLykypkSVBbnBnGqJRcuJMi"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x37bb49513c49c87c4642a891b13b63571bc87013dde806617aa1efb54605f386","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b3036b3a83b7c48f96641f2a9002b9f2dcb6a5958dd670894ada21ae8229b3d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmUNfSBdoVtjhETaUJCYcaC7pTMgbhht926tJ2uXJbiVd3"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0xaf28a975a78550e45f65e559a3ad6a5ad43b9b8a37366999abd1b7084eb70721","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b7bd24e224f67f65bfadf85dc2929fa965456bb2415478bd0125471b5ce35245","dweb:/ipfs/QmRaydGr8BTHs1kvaZfsNU69pKzUAGFrvABn1KiRSbE51y"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf980daa263b661ab8ddee7d4fd833c7da7e7995e2c359ff1f17e67e4112f2236","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7448ab095d6940130bcf76ba47a2eab14148c83119523b93dd89f6d84edd6c02","dweb:/ipfs/QmawrZ4voKQjH3oomXT3Kuheb3Mnmo2VvVpxg8Ne5UJUrd"]}},"version":1}

addSpigot(address,(uint8,bytes4,bytes4)).details: - revenueContract cannot be address(this)- callable by `owner`

params.revenueContract: - smart contract to claim tokens from

params.token: - address of revenue token that is being escrowed by spigot

returns.claimed: -  The amount of tokens claimed by the `operator`

params.token: - address of revenue token that is being escrowed by spigot

returns.claimed: -  The amount of tokens claimed by the `owner`

claimRevenue(address,address,bytes).details: - Assumes the only side effect of calling claimFunc on revenueContract is we receive new tokens.          - Any other side effects could be dangerous to the Spigot or upstream contracts.- callable by anyone

params.data: - Transaction data, including function signature, to properly claim revenue on revenueContract
params.revenueContract: - Contract with registered settings to claim revenue from

returns.claimed: -  The amount of revenue tokens claimed from revenueContract and split between `owner` and `treasury`

params._operator: - An active address for non-Owner that can execute whitelisted functions to manage and maintain product operations                  - on revenue generating contracts controlled by the Spigot.
params._owner: - An address that controls the Spigot and owns rights to some or all tokens earned by owned revenue contracts

params.token: - Revenue token that is being garnished from spigots
- Revenue token that is being garnished from spigots

params.func: - Function signature to check on whitelist

operate(address,bytes).details: - cannot call revenueContracts claim or transferOwner functions- callable by `operator`

params.data: - tx data, including function signature, to call contract with
params.revenueContract: - contract to call. Must have existing settings added by Owner

removeSpigot(address).details: - revenuContract's transfer func MUST only accept one paramteter which is the new owner's address.- callable by `owner`

params.revenueContract: - smart contract to transfer ownership of
- Address of spigoted revenue generating contract

params.allowed: - true/false whether to allow this function to be called by Operator
params.func: - smart contract function signature to whitelist

addSpigot(address,(uint8,bytes4,bytes4)).notice: - allows Owner to add a new revenue stream to the Spigot

claimOperatorTokens(address).notice: - Allows Spigot Operqtor to claim escrowed revenue tokens

claimOwnerTokens(address).notice: - Allows Spigot Owner to claim escrowed revenue tokens

claimRevenue(address,address,bytes).notice: - Claims revenue tokens from the Spigoted revenue contract and stores them for the Owner and Operator to withdraw later.          - Accepts both push (tokens sent directly to Spigot) and pull payments (Spigot calls revenue contract to claim tokens)          - Calls predefined function in contract settings to claim revenue.          - Automatically sends portion to Treasury and then stores Owner and Operator shares          - There is no conversion or trade of revenue tokens.

constructor.notice: - Configure data for Spigot stakeholders                  - Owner/operator/treasury can all be the same address when setting up a Spigot

getOperatorTokens(address).notice: - Retrieve amount of revenue tokens escrowed waiting for claim

getOwnerTokens(address).notice: - Retrieve amount of revenue tokens escrowed waiting for claim

isWhitelisted(bytes4).notice: - Returns if the function is whitelisted for an Operator to call - on the spigoted revenue generating smart contracts.

operate(address,bytes).notice: - Allows Operator to call whitelisted functions on revenue contracts to maintain their product          - while still allowing Spigot Owner to receive its revenue stream

removeSpigot(address).notice: - Uses predefined function in revenueContract settings to transfer complete control and ownership from this Spigot to the Operator

updateOperator(address).notice: - Update Operator role of Spigot contract.          - New Operator can interact with revenue contracts.

updateOwner(address).notice: - Update Owner role of Spigot contract.          - New Owner receives revenue stream split and can control Spigot

updateOwnerSplit(address,uint8).notice: - Changes the revenue split between the Treasury and the Owner based upon the status of the Line of Credit          - or otherwise if the Owner and Borrower wish to change the split.

updateWhitelistedFunction(bytes4,bool).notice: - Allows Owner to whitelist function methods across all revenue contracts for Operator to call.          - Can whitelist "transfer ownership" functions on revenue contracts          - allowing Spigot to give direct control back to Operator.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct SpigotState storage pointer,address,address,bytes memory) returns (uint256)
function (struct SpigotState storage pointer,address,bytes memory) returns (bool)
function (struct SpigotState storage pointer,address,struct ISpigot.Setting memory) returns (bool)

 @param token - Revenue token that is being garnished from spigots

 @param token - Revenue token that is being garnished from spigots

function (struct SpigotState storage pointer,address) view returns (uint8,bytes4,bytes4)
